text: Love the Prawn Noodles, similar to the Penang style. Is rich and flavourful, full of umami. Price is reasonable. Foodcourt is airy and spacious. The 1 and only Halal Chinese style economic rice is as good. Pleasant service from the owner and his staff. Definitely will be going back again soon.

Prawn broth was rich and flavourful. Lor mee was also scrumptious ‚Ä¶ quite kids friendly too because the food court is very airy, windy, clean and seats for kids at the back of the food court .. highly recommended for families
Food is great for the price. $6.80 for the big prawn mee. Also, the free ngoh hiang was crispy and tasty. Definitely value for money!

We pack the food home to eat. After eating halfway, we realised the fish lor mee doesn't have any fish and egg.
Prawn mee doesn't have prawn.
I was only give noodle, gravy for the lor mee and soup and noodles for the prawn mee?
